message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $108. It's a great deal, and I think it's worth it, considering the value it will bring to you!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure if I can stretch to $108. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $112. It's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to you, and I think you'll find it's worth it!
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $112. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle one last time.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $92. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'm going to meet you at $106. It's the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in the product.

I understand you're trying to meet me at a reasonable price, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $106. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $120, but I'll make one last offer to you. I'll pay $96 for the product. This is my final offer.
